questions.question: Do you document and share lessons learned from operational events?
Do you regularly evaluate workloads to identify improvement opportunities?
Do you manage access using least privilege principles?
Do you encrypt data at rest and in transit?
Does your workload have automated recovery from failures?
Do you test reliability procedures and failure scenarios regularly?
Do you use data to make informed decisions about architecture and scaling?
Do you take advantage of AWS services to improve performance efficiency?
Do you regularly review your cost efficiency and right-size resources?
Do you use AWS pricing models and cost tools effectively?
Do you measure and track the environmental impact of your workload?
Do you implement strategies to improve energy efficiency and reduce waste?
